mapper.insert: insert into user_tb values (0, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, now(), null);
mapper.select:
select ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.password, ut.email, ut.create_dt, ut.update_dt,
urt.user_role_id, urt.user_id as urt_user_id, urt.role_id as urt_role_id,
rt.role_id, rt.role_name, rt.role_name_kor
from user_tb ut join user_role_tb urt on (ut.user_id = urt.user_id) join role_tb rt on (rt.role_id = urt.role_id) where email = #{email};
